pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.11_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.15_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.16_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.17.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.2_0: the nuns gave the full admission to a woman who was breastfeeding.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.3_0: As a consequence he collected almsfood.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.5_0: “Give almsfood to the Venerable. She has a companion.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.6_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.7_0: “How can the nuns give the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.8_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.9_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.10_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.11_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.12_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.13_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.14.1_0: If she is breastfeeding, and she perceives her as such, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.15_0: If she is breastfeeding, but she is unsure of it, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.16_0: If she is breastfeeding, but she does not perceive her as such, and she gives her the full admission, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.17_0: If she is not breastfeeding, but she perceives her as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.18_0: If she is not breastfeeding, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.19_0: If she is not breastfeeding, and she does not perceive her as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.21_0: if she gives the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding, but she does not perceive her as such;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.22_0: if she gives the full admission to a woman who is not breastfeeding, and she does not perceive her as such;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.24_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.25_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.6_0: she is a mother or a wet-nurse.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.9_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
